text:
It seems that Bruno Mars is a massive fan of Cardi B and he took to his social media account to praise her. Check out what he has to say about the songstress.

Bruno said that he met her at 3 am after his show in LA backstage where they recorded her verse for Finesse. He said that when she walked into the room, he saw right then and there that she was everything that he hoped she would be.

He tells Cardi never to change and not to let the music business ever change who she is.

‘You possess something that can’t be taught. You’re a true star. Thank you for putting all of your energy and love all over this record and video. I hope that you feel better soon because we got some celebrating to do. Everyone, show your love for the one and only CARDI B!’

It’s great that Cardi B is getting so much love from another music celebrity especially these days when she must be feeling really low considering everything that has happened in her relationship with Offset.

Another sex tape was just leaked featuring Offset and another woman, and unfortunately, this one seems to date from only a few weeks ago.

His alleged baby mama Celina Powell seems to enjoy the problems that Cardi and Offset these days, and she even makes fun of the couple on her social media account.

Advertisement

‘So baby dad @OffsetYRN how’s your night going @iamcardib what about you sis? Anything???’ Celina tweeted. We can’t tell what will happen to Cardi and Offset’s relationship with everything that has happened lately.
title: Bruno Mars Is A Huge Cardi B Fan: ‘You Possess Something That Can’t Be Taught”
